itemFeatures.itemFeature: Made of veneers, wood, engineered wood and cast resin

itemFluffs.itemFluff: Inspired by the grandeur and grace of Old World traditional style, this panel headboard is nothing short of stunning. A choice blend of materials is accented by detailed ornamental appliques. Large-scale decorative pilasters make a grand stance.
